data.price: (Ẹ rántí Ànábì) ’Ayyūb, nígbà tí ó pe Olúwa rẹ̀ pé: “Dájúdájú ọwọ́ ìnira ti kàn mí. Ìwọ sì ni Aláàánú jùlọ nínú àwọn aláàánú.”
data.arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna

data.price: A sì jẹ́pè rẹ̀. A mú gbogbo ìnira rẹ̀ kúrò fún un. A tún fún un ní àwọn ẹbí rẹ̀ (padà) àti irú wọn pẹ̀lú wọn; (ó jẹ́) ìkẹ́ láti ọ̀dọ̀ Wa àti ìrántí fún àwọn olùjọ́sìn (fún Wa).
data.arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرّٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡعَٰبِدِينَ

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajabnā lahu fakashafnā mā bihi min ḍurrin waātaynāhu ahlahu wamith'lahum maʿahum raḥmatan min ʿindinā wadhik'rā lil'ʿābidīna

dua.name: Dua for Overcoming Adversity
dua.significanceReason: Powerful supplication for those experiencing severe hardships, seeking divine intervention and relief from challenging circumstances.

version.title: Yoruba translation
